datesheetmgmt
====

``datesheetmgmt`` will make the complete Matrix,Seating Plan,Attendance Sheets,DutyChart for a given examination. 

..contents::Table of contents
	:blacklinks: top
	:local:

Installation
------------

.. code:: sh

    pip install tqdm

Requirements
------------

Modules
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
``numpy``
``xlsxwriter``
``Tkinter``
``pandas``

Excel files required
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

``Datesheet.xlsx``
``roomfile.xlsx``
``Student List files `` in xlsx format
